file_content.text: Again, you return, but Seh-run has no more need of you.
Seh-run will speak with you no more, treacherous one.
You return, and you have meat! Seh-run smells it.
Hope it pleases you.
Here.
Prithor gave me what I needed. Now take your food, you monster.
How disgusting.
Excellent. Excellent. But there is something... odd. It has not tasted flesh in too long, perhaps? Or--
The meat does not make Seh-run strong. The meat makes it strange! What do you feed it?
Something to put you down. You're a sick creature, Seh-run... I'm not letting you run free.
Food to stop you.
Only what I have to.
Prithor betrays it! You betray it! All Sith hate Seh-run.
Show some gratitude.
Seh-run curses you, despises you!
Go away, now, and leave it alone.
Goodbye.
Leave this evil place, Seh-run. Leave the Academy, and leave Korriban if you can. It's no place for you.
You can be redeemed.
Pitiful.
Go away!
Excellent. Excellent. Seh-run's hunger is sated! It feels its power growing even now--feels the strength of the Sith, like in the Academy.
Seh-run thanks you. Take your reward. Take your prizes! Trinkets Seh-run collected from the caves.
Thank you. Now grow stronger, and feast on the meat of acolytes. Many more will come to these caves.
Kill well, friend.
Yes! Yes, Seh-run will be strong enough to hunt even Sith....
We're done.
Seh-run will think of you when it next feeds.
Remember this kindness, Seh-run. Remember the Sith who helped you, and that you don't need to kill.
Learn from my mercy.
Seh-run will remember when Seh-run grows hungry again....
You will feed Seh-run. You will bring it food from Overseer Prithor.
Who is this? Who comes speaking to Seh-run? Is it acolyte? Is it Sith?
I'm an acolyte now, but I'll be Sith soon.
That's correct.
I am Sith, and I am your master.
I'm in charge.
No. Pity Seh-run, for it has no master anymore.
You're a strange creature.
Seh-run does not know its kind. Only its place.
I'm surprised a wretch like you can talk.
What a freak.
Seh-run can speak, yes. Seh-run can talk and walk and devour.
Seh-run once lived in the Academy--was once like you! Seh-run feasted on the scraps of the beast pens... until the overseer sent it away to starve.
I, too, am despised in the Academy.
I can sympathize.
Yes. You understand--we are both outcasts. Not human!
You understand. Seh-run hungered and was mocked for it.
We were never alike--I'm the pride of the Academy.
You're nothing next to me.
Then you are fortunate.
Wait. Slow down...
One of the overseers abandoned you? You must want revenge.
You should be angry.
Revenge? Yes. But its hunger is greater.
When Seh-run was small and weak, it lived in the darkness--ate the things that crawled and hid from Sith.
Then Overseer Prithor found Seh-run. Brought bones and meat for Seh-run! Made Seh-run stronger--much better than supping on worms and rats.
What do you mean "stronger"?
Stronger?
When Prithor fed Seh-run, it became more powerful. It became faster and stronger! More and more every time. But not anymore.
How'd you end up here?
If you can't feed yourself, you deserve to starve.
How pathetic.
No! Seh-run deserves more! Seh-run deserves better!
Overseer Prithor stopped feeding Seh-run special meals. Kept Seh-run from getting stronger, and sent it away. Seh-run hid here, in the caves.
But Seh-run has no peace! Monsters hurt it, and Seh-run is too weak to hurt monsters back. Seh-run needs strength from Prithor's meat. Needs power.
If Prithor's the one who exiled you to these caves, I doubt he'll change his mind about feeding you.
Why would the overseer help?
He could! He might.
I could assist.
Yes. Yes!
Too bad.
Yes. Curse Seh-run's weakness!
You could save Seh-run. You could find Prithor... make him give us his special food. Seh-run would be strong enough to hunt then!
If Prithor is really behind all this, he may be worth investigating.
Interesting.
There is strength and power within you. I'd like to know the source.
Interesting.
Overseer Prithor works in the beast pens. He will have scraps for Seh-run. Find him, and Seh-run will reward you.
Of course.
Leave me, wretch.
Wait! Wait. Seh-run can give you things. Bring it Prithor's food, and it will reward you with treasures from this tomb!
Please help Seh-run. Feed Seh-run, and it will help you.
All right.
Your "help" better be worthy.
It will be a good reward! Yes.
Seh-run will wait for you here. Wait for its meal.
No chance. [Refuse quest]
Wicked Sith! Seh-run will starve alone, then.
Little acolyte. Little Sith. Too little for Seh-run to care.
Go away!
